Text: thanx, im a metal head just getting into opera and was suprised someone even had this on here
thanks he has a great voice,great music for setting the scene....if you know what i mean ;0

@andiamaj22

Not to burst your bubble, but Bocelli's music is more pop than opera. Opera is like a musical but with classical music. Bottom line, Bocelli sings classical music. Just to inform you, not to make you look dumb or anything else that might be going through your mind.
